description.text:
Champion! Something awefull has happened. 
The $(b;spring)Shadow Court$() has returned and their $(b;spring)Enderman$() have stolen the $(b;spring)Elytra$()!
Why you looking so confused at me! 
Ow right....hmm where to begin!
The Elytra is the property of the $(b;summer)Golden Seelie Court$(), cause it can only be owned by the strongest court!
...right....the Shadow Court....
uhm......maybe we should $(b;spring)find$() a $(b;spring)Librarian$() who can give us access to ancient books.
